alert.note: Alert for Sullivan; Vigo (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 27 at 10:27PM EST until February 04 at 7:32AM EST by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for a portion of the following river in Indiana...Illinois... Wabash River from Lafayette downstream to Riverton. .Lowland flooding continues along much of the Wabash River, from Lafayette down to Riverton. There is potential for flooding to develop later in the week at Vincennes. The crest is currently at Lafayette and rising at all locations south of Lafayette. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL SUNDAY, FEBRUARY 04... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Wabash River at Terre Haute. * WHEN...Until Sunday, February 04. * IMPACTS...At 21.0 feet, The Wabash River extends to Interstate 70 Mile Marker Number 4 from its west bank in the Terre Haute and West Terre Haute area. All lakes in this area are affected by seep water and reach capacity with some minor flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:30 PM EST Saturday /8:30 PM CST Saturday/ the stage was 18.6 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:30 PM EST Saturday /8:30 PM CST Saturday/ was 18.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 20.9 feet early Tuesday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage Saturday, February 03. - Flood stage is 16.5 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. The next statement should be issued Sunday afternoon by around 130 PM EST /1230 PM CST/.
